attributes.description:
The New 2022 Opel Corsa 1.2T Edition (74kw) 6MT

NOW AVAILABLE ON AN EASTER SPECIAL FOR R 315 900.00 That's a R 18 000 EASTER EGG GIVE AWAY!.

The new OPEL Corsa is here! And it’s no surprise that the 6th Generation OPEL Corsa comes standard with innovative tech and specs that far outweigh what you bargained for. Take a look!

Standard features include:

7" Touchscreen IntelliLink Infotainment
Smartphone Mirror Link Projection/Apple CarPlay /Android auto 
Radio/Bluetooth®/USB
Manual Air Conditioning
Power Windows – Front & Rear
Power Adjustable Side Mirrors
Flat bottom Steering Wheel with Audio Controls
16" Alloy Wheels
Cruise Control with Speed Limiter and Speed Limit Adaptation
Rear Park-Assist
Hill-Start Assist (HSA)
Traction control
Lane departure warning
Active safety braking
Speed Reading and recommendations 
Road signs recognition 
Driver attention warning
Motion sensor detector 
ISOFIX Child Seat Anchorage
Automatic Headlamp dipping
Front Fog Lamps
180 Degree Panoramic Reverse Camera
Tyre pressure Monitoring

Standard with a 3year/45000km service plan and 3year /120000km warranty,andro corrosion warranty 12 years /unlimited km 

Trade ins welcome ,finance available,delivery country wide

For more information on the New Corsa please feel free to contact me on 060 332 6955 or inbox.

#opelgeorge
